content.text:
# Heston Central (ward)

Heston Central is an electoral ward in the London Borough of Hounslow. The ward was first used in the 1978 elections and elects three councillors to Hounslow London Borough Council.
Geography
The ward is named after the central areas of the suburb of Heston.
